channel.title: Meta Mind Shift Show by NiKole Maxwell, Metaverse Goddess
channel.description:
What is the Metaverse, who belongs here and why is it important? Get to know some of our specials guests, news, reviews and more! NiKole Maxwell presents the Meta Mind Shift Show. Throughout the season the show will explore virtual worlds, address pressing questions, and host interviews and panel discussions focused around the Metaverse and the BIPOC Community.
If you are interested in participating on the show as a guest or if you would like to use my content please send requests to nikole@technikole.com. Distributed by MaxDistro.[No other resources are authorized to provide content ]

item.title: Subscription Gate | 30 Days of Metaverse [Meta Mind Shift Show]
item.description:
On today's Meta Mind Shift Show, we're pushing further into our #30DaysOfMetaverse journey. This week we delve into the controversial topic of Subscriptions for NFT platforms, a turn from free-to-fee models, while continuing to charge transaction fees. We explore how this is affecting the digital community and the future implications. üåêüí∞

Joining us as our esteemed guest host is the trailblazer in the realm of the metaverse, Technikole. Together, we'll discuss her insights and perspectives on these developments, and much more. Don't miss this chance to listen to one of the Metaverse's most compelling voices.

We will also reflect on the past week of the Metaverse journey, examining the new trends, breakthroughs, and innovative concepts that have emerged. Will these changes reshape the Metaverse as we know it? Join us as we explore the answers.

Meta Mind Shift Show is scheduled:: June 21, 2023, 6PM EST. Get ready to explore the labyrinth of digital innovation and transformation, and learn how to navigate and thrive in this new reality. üëæüöÄ

Join NiKole Technikole Maxwell and our vibrant community. We‚Äôre not just observers - we‚Äôre pioneers crafting the digital future. Streamed live with replays available. Engage with us in the comments!

Tags: #30DaysOfMetaverse, 30 Days of Metaverse, Subscriptions for NFT Platforms, Meta Mind Shift, technikole, nikole maxwell, metaverse, digital transformation, polygon NFT, Ethereum/polygon wallet, AI Evolution, transaction fees, NFT Platforms, Metaverse, rules, regulations, guidelines, Meta Mask Wallet, Web3, breakthroughs, futuristic possibilities, digital transformation, Meta Mind Shift Show, live, scheduled, 6PM EST, building the future, streamed live, replays, comments.

item.title: Metaverse Beauty Week June 14th | 30 Days of Metaverse [Meta Mind Shift Show]
item.description:
We're continuing the #30DaysofMetaverse #challenge This week we dive into Metaverse Beauty Week and recap the first 12 days. We discuss "Unleashing the Power of AI for Proposals" and provide a walk through Decentraland, Spatial and Hiberworld. Virtual worlds and wearables. We're diving deeper into the Metaverse, encouraging not just creation but exploration and immersion too. Following the success of #30DaysOfCode and our inaugural #30DaysOfMetaverse, we're back with a more ambitious project. üöÄ Get ready for a mind-blowing episode of the Meta Mind Shift Show, exploring the exhilarating evolution of artificial intelligence (AI)! ü§ñ‚ú® Join us as we dive into the latest breakthroughs, futuristic possibilities and digital transformation and its impact on our world. Meta Mind Shift Show is scheduled:: June 14, 2023, 6PM EST Augment Your Creativity, its time for your Digital Transformation as we head into the Metaverse. Join NiKole Technikole Maxwell as we discover, explore and thrive --- we're building the future! Streamed live, catch up on the replays join us in the comments! item.title: Ode to the Metaverse | June 7th | 30 Days of Metaverse [Meta Mind Shift Show]
item.description:
Week one of 30 Days of Metaverse #30DaysOfMetaverse Kickoff, Magic in the Metaverse, Ode to the Metaverse Song, Movie Night in the Metaverse (wewatchtogether.us), Happily centralized (Apple Vision Pro), Mobile Metaverse, This year, we're diving deeper into the Metaverse, encouraging not just creation but exploration and immersion too. Following the success of #30DaysOfCode and our inaugural #30DaysOfMetaverse, we're back with a more ambitious project. We're building the Metaverse, one creation at a time, and we invite you to be a part of this journey. This isn't a traditional NFT project. It's an ever-evolving, decentralized catalog united under the hashtag #30DaysOfMetaverse. Get ready for Metaverse Beauty Week. We're calling for your unique contributions - be it imaginative Metaverse creations, AI generations, blockchain games, or immersive 360 backdrops. The goal? To capture our collective vision of the Metaverse and mint it onto the blockchain. üöÄ Get ready for a mind-blowing episode of the Meta Mind Shift Show, exploring the exhilarating evolution of artificial intelligence (AI)! ü§ñ‚ú® Join us as we dive into the latest breakthroughs, futuristic possibilities and digital transformation and its impact on our world. Meta Mind Shift Show is scheduled:: June 7th, 6PM EST Augment Your Creativity, its time for your Digital Transformation as we head into the Metaverse. Join NiKole Technikole Maxwell as we discover, explore and thrive --- we're building the future! Streamed live, catch up on the replays join us in the comments! item.title: Evolution of AI || Meta Mind Shift Show May 17th, 2023
item.description:
Telephones, AI shackles and more...Imagine a world without instant global connectivity, where the absence of the telephone creates a void in our ability to connect, share, and innovate. We all love our cellphones and most probably wouldn't reverse time but it's definitely a thought-provoking journey! Todays free claim POET (Proof of Experience Token) -- Free polygon NFT - Connect your Ethereum/polygon wallet - technikole.com/mmss-may17 üåü Discover how AI's evolution has shaped our present reality and get a glimpse of the awe-inspiring possibilities that lie ahead. From self-driving cars revolutionizing transportation to AI-powered healthcare transforming lives, we are living in the AI Evolution. This will be what we make it. Congress met on Tuesday to discuss the AI era as we march towards a Metaverse. Rules, Regulations, Guidelines and more... Also...did you notice the new terms of service on the Meta Mask Wallet? item.title: Metaverse Privacy - Impossible To Keep Your Identity Safe? Meta Mind Shift Show S2 E6
item.description:
Eye-opening news about the unique identification of 50,000-plus virtual reality (VR) users from just their head and hand motion data! This recent development has been rocking the internet, and it's not hard to see why. Let's explore how motion detection technology has made it easier than ever to identify users in the Metaverse. In just under two seconds of movement users are being uniquely identified. Can decentralized IDs be the answer to protect your identity and privacy in our interconnected future? Read the article for mind-blowing information about your data and privacy in VR https://venturebeat.com/virtual/new-research-suggests-that-privacy-in-the-metaverse-might-be-impossible/ But when will we start to care about our data and how it's being utilized? That's the big question. In a world where technology is advancing at an unprecedented pace, it's important to consider the implications of these advancements. Join us as we delve into this fascinating topic and shed light on the importance of protecting our data in the virtual world. Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show with your guide - NiKole Maxwell. What is the Metaverse? What does it mean to us? The answers will come to that and more. Join us as we explore and experience the Metaverse. We have a whole new world being built up around us and we are going to reach out and touch it! item.dc:creator: Meta Mind Shift Show
item.itunes:summary:
Eye-opening news about the unique identification of 50,000-plus virtual reality (VR) users from just their head and hand motion data! This recent development has been rocking the internet, and it's not hard to see why. Let's explore how motion detection technology has made it easier than ever to identify users in the Metaverse. In just under two seconds of movement users are being uniquely identified. Can decentralized IDs be the answer to protect your identity and privacy in our interconnected future? Read the article for mind-blowing information about your data and privacy in VR https://venturebeat.com/virtual/new-research-suggests-that-privacy-in-the-metaverse-might-be-impossible/ But when will we start to care about our data and how it's being utilized? That's the big question. In a world where technology is advancing at an unprecedented pace, it's important to consider the implications of these advancements. Join us as we delve into this fascinating topic and shed light on the importance of protecting our data in the virtual world. Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show with your guide - NiKole Maxwell. item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1, E15] Dr. Tammy Francis, Blockchain Injections [MaxDistro]
item.description:
Meta Mind Shift Show by NiKole Maxwell Presents: Dr. Tammy Francis, Ph.D.,   She is the known as the Catalyst and affectionately called Dr. Tammy, is the founder of Catalyst 4 Change Global, LLC. Dr. Tammy is a global business strategist, blockchain consultant, author, and speaker. Notably, Dr. Tammy is a TEDx Speaker with an extensive list of publications. Read more about Dr Tammy below.  

What is the Metaverse? What does it mean to us? Join us as we explore and experience the Metaverse .  We have a whole new world being built up around us and we are going to reach out and touch it!     Special guests come from around the blockchain, specialists in Web3, Crypto, NFTs, DAOs and more will tap in to discuss new technologies, community challenges and issues that no one else is talking about.  Watch as we dip toes in the Metaverse.     Get your Meta Mind Shift Show T-Shirts at maxdistro.shop  Provided by MaxDistro Worldwide, Executive Produced by NiKole Maxwell)    

YouTube handles are back! Find us at YouTube.com/@MetaMindShift or support the show on Spotify @ metamindshift.com/spotify    

üí≤If you appreciate the info shared: 

Donations are welcome | üí≤CashApp: $technikole üí≤ 

DISCOUNTS üí≤    

‚èπÔ∏è Storj [Decentralized Cloud Storage, DCS] - https://us1.storj.io/signup?partner=technikole    

‚èπÔ∏è Skiff [Decentralized Workspaces & (e)Mail] - https://app.skiff.com/signup?mail&referral=BMVRSE    

‚èπÔ∏è Constant Contact [Email/Contact Management] - https://www.constantcontact.com/partner-offer?pn=technikoleconsulting    

‚èπÔ∏è Artsy in VR [tell her technikole sent you] - artsyvr.com    

‚èπÔ∏è Ledger Cold Wallet - https://shop.ledger.com/?r=cc895df7d648    

‚èπÔ∏è Google Workspace - https://referworkspace.app.goo.gl/kVUo    

‚èπÔ∏è Adobe Creator Studio - https://www.adobe.com/?mv=affiliate&mv2=red  

 About Dr Tammy -  connect, visit http://www.linktr.ee/drtammyfrancis

As a strategist and consultant, she empowers and equips leaders, entrepreneurs, and business startups all over the world with purpose-driven, creative business solutions to build, grow, and scale while preparing for the future of business. Dr. Tammy has a Ph.D. in Curriculum and Instruction. Currently, Dr. Tammy is also a tenured Associate Professor in Texas and Professor at Althash University, a global campus that offers online blockchain programs. As a consultant to organizations, corporations, businesses, and institutions, Dr. Tammy develops and evaluates blockchain-based curriculum and educational programs. She provides education and talks on several topics, such as the new literacies, multiliteracies, blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, metaverse, decentralized autonomous organizations, onboarding into Web 3.0, business development, future of education and learning, technology innovation in education (edtech), future of business, future of work, college and career readiness, and careers in the blockchain/Web 3.0/digital assets industries.

Currently, Dr. Tammy is also a tenured Associate Professor in Texas and Professor at Althash University, a global campus that offers online blockchain programs. As a consultant to organizations, corporations, businesses, and institutions, Dr. Tammy develops and evaluates blockchain-based curriculum and educational programs. She provides education and talks on several topics, such as the new literacies, multiliteracies, blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, metaverse, decentralized autonomous organizations, onboarding into Web 3.0, business development, future of education and learning, technology innovation in education (edtech), future of business, future of work, college and career readiness, and careers in the blockchain/Web 3.0/digital assets industries.

item.title: Meta Mind Shift | Bonus: Black Business Olympics Nov 2022
item.description:
Meta Mind Shift | Bonus: Black Business Olympics Nov 2022 

Just for a our Spotify Subscribers we present a bonus broadcast straight from the Black Business Olympics November 2022.  This talk is special to me because it is dedicated to the memory of my paternal Grandmother at the time of her passing.  

Reality vs Virtual Reality. Black Business Networks Black Business Olympics, I spoke about the challenges of making a Metaverse accessible for everyone. Creating an enjoyable place that everyone can experience without excluding people with different abilities. This experience was dedicated to the memory of my Grandmother that recently passed. She spent her days caring for the special needs of not only her son but also all of her differbilitied students as a teacher.

How will we ensure that the 1 in 4 people affected by differbilities will flourish in the Metaverse, VR and AR?
Our elder population is increasing rapidly. As we build, our solutions need to be able to support those on the fringes as well as the masses.

Thank you to all of the Black 'Verse family that is supporting this season of the Black Business Olympics.

Catch the replay (click the pic)

Post some of your favorite solutions that are being created to ensure that the elderly and differbilitied folks will make it into the Metaverse and beyond.
#bbx #bbo #blackbusinessolympic #business #experience #network #students #teacher #visionimpaired #tbi #wheelchair #adacompliance Tammy Francis, Ph.D. Lori Mitchell, BS, RRT Ira Revels Jermaine Gregory Kristopher Webster Black Business Expo #disability #sustainable #sponsor #compliance #maxdistro #metamindshift #technikole #metaverse #future #build #buidl #apps #dapps #create #space

--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/metamindshift/message

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1, E12] Decentralized Storage and Moving Into the Metaverse for the Culture
item.description:
The #metaverse is coming but its not the one you think.  [GMP] Gross Metaverse Product has become a metric to track and take notice of according to Dubai..  Interpol announces the metaverse virtual police force dedicated to policing the Metaverse.  L'Or`eal launches a metaverse startup accelerator and that dern  Facebook declares its going to ban the news in Canada...how can a company do something so bold to a whole entire country? What happens when they decide YOU don't need to know about a trending news topic or a world event? We explore decentralized options that are growing on the Blockchain and in Web3.

item.dc:creator: Meta Mind Shift Show
item.itunes:summary:
The #metaverse is coming but its not the one you think.  [GMP] Gross Metaverse Product has become a metric to track and take notice of according to Dubai..  Interpol announces the metaverse virtual police force dedicated to policing the Metaverse.  L'Or`eal launches a metaverse startup accelerator and that dern  Facebook declares its going to ban the news in Canada...how can a company do something so bold to a whole entire country? What happens when they decide YOU don't need to know about a trending news topic or a world event? We explore decentralized options that are growing on the Blockchain and in Web3.

Snag some discounts:

  • Storj [Decentralized Cloud Storage]
  • Skiff [Decentralized Workspaces & (e)Mail]
  • Constant Contact [Email/Contact Management]
  • Artsy in VR [tell her technikole sent you]
  • Ledger Cold Wallet 
  • Google Workspace 
  • Adobe Creator Studio

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1, E11] No One is Here and Other Things They Said [Metaverse vs Meta] #Web3
item.description:
The #metaverse  is empty but so is a concert hall....prespective matters - why those numbers are silly metrics (for now). Guess what - if no one is here and EVERYONE is out building and talking about this space doesn't that make it the quiet before the storm?? GET HERE NOW!

Also AR - augment your reality, a tiger invades your living room! VR - you walk through a Zoo on Pluto.  Video AI, Artificial Intelligence now creates videos.... have you thought about what else is cooking up in the basement?  Privacy polcies,  Ultimechs & more.

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1, E10] Meta Connect...Reaction and Real Talk
item.description:
Metaverse 100 - "the list", In the News AR Glasses, Google and Coinbase partnering, Dubai, UAE in a race for the metaverse,  Sharjarverse, Facebook cuts jobs and then rolls hosted Meta Connect today.  This just got real - your data has been used to develop all of the technologies that were showcased in the Meta Connect conference for developers especially those that are still in demo phase.  Immediately after this video was created Facebook sent out an update to the privacy policy to account for access to your ocular data, your facial responses, and all spatial data....who is being paid for it? NOT YOU! Wake up and step into Web3.   

Events this week:  

Google Basics - Black Multiverse Enterprises and Grow with Google every Tuesday and Thursday #growwithgoogle  [October 11th & 13th, 2022 13 10AM EST]   https://blackmultiverse.io/basics

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1, E9] Ira Revels, Grants, Funding, Libraries and AI MUST SEE!
item.description:
Have you been in need of some good sista time? When was the last time you were free to just geek all the way out?  You've come to the right place! This weeks session of the Meta Mind Shift Show was absolute fire. We discuss grants, Web3 funding, possbilities for Libraries based on the bockchain, and of course what else makes sense but robots and A.I. Artificial Intelligence as we head into the future of the Metaverse with afrocentric, afropositive AI generated art with the Founder of Black Tech Futures Media - blacktechfutures.media.  Catch up with IRA REVELS and everything shes got going on.

item.title: Commercial: Power of Decentralization (Black 'Verse Summit 2022)
item.description:
Register for the Black 'Verse Summit!

Tickets on sale - Eventbrite | Use code "VCAST" for 10% off

Join us on September 15 & 16th | 9AM to noon EST

Black 'Verse Metaverse Community is hosting our first Black 'Verse Summit and you are invited to jump in!

The theme for our first summit is the 'POWER OF DECENTRALIZATION". It will be a virtual community get together to remember. We will hone in on the blockchain, Web3 and the Metaverse as we progress towards a decentralized future.

Our speakers this year include:

  • NÔªøajah Roberts, Crypto Blockchain Plug
  • AÔªørtsy, Artsy in VR, Creating the Metaverse
  • DÔªør Eric Kelly III, Black Business Network
  • KÔªøristopher Webster, Avatar Convention Center
  • DÔªør Tammy Francis, Catalyst for Change Global
  • GÔªøRAND WOO, Music on the Blockchain
  • JÔªøiminica Jet, Play to Earn and Win
  • SÔªøonia Kumi, Koss Preneur (Phygitals)
  • NÔªøes Rox, African Museum of the Metaverse
  • KÔªøwame Symbolik, TechMisfits
  • IÔªøra Revels, Black Tech Futures Media
  • WÔªøiliam & Aida Jackson
  • SÔªøheera Sabur, Afrofuturism
  • FÔªøred Brandon, Flames Foundation
  • MÔªøarcus Carey, Tribe of Hackers

We will be present in various Metaverse communities and streaming those that are not browser based.

[a VR HEADSET IS NOT REQUIRED TO ENJOY THIS EVENT]

Jump into the Metaverse with the Black 'Verse community!

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1 E6] What the AI? Traditional Artist Meets AI, Dr Eric Kelly III
item.description:
Are you a traditional artist? Do you wonder what the Metaverse has in store for you? Are you feeling confused about AI or generated art? Catch up to your Meta Mind Shift with NiKole Maxwell as we talk to Dr. Eric Kelly, III a traditional artist, painter and visionary.   Dr Eric Kelly is the CEO and branding guru behind the Black Business Network, Black Business Expo and the Black Business Olympics but he is also a lifelong traditional artist who has been drawing and painting for over 60 years.  His catalog of work began when he was 4 years old.  Hear his take on GAN and AI art, NFTs, and of course the future of art in the Metaverse.

 ==========  üíö Don't forget to like, subscribe and follow üíö ==========

 Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show with your guide - NiKole Maxwell, Metaverse Goddess  What is the Metaverse? What does it mean to us?   Time to get some answers. Join us as we explore and experience the Metaverse.  We have a whole new world being built up around us and we are going to reach out and touch it!  Special guests will come from around the blockchain, specialists in Web3, Crypto, NFTs, DAOs and more will tap in to discuss new technologies, community challenges and issues that no one else is talking about. 

SUBSCRIBERS to our Spotify channels receive addtional benefits including bonus footage, blooper reels, special moments and addtional tutorials as well as sneak peeks and first takes on new innovations.  Subscribers receive special pricing on Community access and premium affliate connections.

 =========  üíö   Don't forget to LIKE and SUBSCRIBE! üíö ===========  Its time for your Meta Mind Shift, its time to Discover the Metaverse, lets go! MetaMindShift.com  Thank you to our sponsors, Black Multiverse Enterprises, Artsy in VR, Black Business Network, EE Testing Center of Inglewood, CA, Black 'Verse a Metaverse Community, Technikole Consulting. 

 Additional sponsors welcome & Metaverse experiences wanted - add yours to our showcase at - info@technikole.com.

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1 E5] Its Avatar Awareness Day!
item.description:
Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show, episode 5. Join your guide - NiKole Maxwell, Metaverse Goddess as she connects with...whoa you gotta wait and see.  The Metaverse is for everyone. But how will you show up? How will your Avatar represent you? What will your relationship be like with your avatar? Will you have to get a whole new wardrobe for it? (her? him?)  Will you be able to create the avatar that you WANT to represent you or will you be stuck with carbon copies and no cheek bones?

Its time for a Meta Mind Shift - what does it look like to "be" an Avatar?  

Subscribe to receive bonus material, bloopers and special access opportunities.

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1 E4] Special Guest Warrington Hudlin, Producer, Director, Metaverse Creator
item.description:
Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show, episode 4. Join your guide - NiKole Maxwell, Metaverse Goddess as she connects with world renowned Producer, & Director Warrington Hudlin, "Mr. Hudlin". The Metaverse is for everyone, all people of all ages and sizes will find their space in the Metaverse and Mr. Hudlin is a long time VR enthusiast with stories to tell.  He is kicking things up a notch with his very own Metaverse Movie Theatre. Learn why "We Watch Together" (WeWatchTogether.us) is the destination for virtual reality movie goers.


About Warrington Hudlin:

He is an organizer, disruptor, and content creator of motion pictures, television, and Virtual Reality (VR).  He is best known as the Producer of the landmark African American films:  HOUSE PARTY, BOOMERANG, and BEBE KIDS.  President of BFF (aka the Black Filmmaker Foundation),  Metaverse Creator of WeWatchTogether.us

=========  üíö   Don't forget to LIKE, SUBSCRIBE and SHARE! üíö ===========

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show [S1 E3] Special Guest Najah Roberts, Crypto Queen
item.description:
Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show, episode 3. Join your guide - NiKole Maxwell, Metaverse Goddess as she connects with Najah Roberts, Crypto Queen! So excited to have her come to us to talk about her stance on the future, decentralized.  Najah Roberts (http://najahroberts.com/) changes lives and communities through cryptocurrency, Bitcoin.  She is a creator, innovator, and the visionary behind Crypto Kids Camp and the Digital Financial Revolution Tour.  

Najah Roberts radio show, Ahead of the Crypto Curve is broadcast on the Tavis Smiley station KBLA 150AM radio, she is also out here building Silicon Hoods https://najahroberts.com/podcast/ Najah is also the author of a book, Becoming Najah, Stories of Misery, Mystery and Mastery.   She lays it out and gets real and vulnerable as a woman who has gone through change.  Grab your copy today. https://najahroberts.com/books/

item.title: Meta Mind Shift Show - S1 E2 [NFTs Phygitals Designer Koss Couture]
item.description:
Welcome to the Meta Mind Shift Show with your guide - NiKole "Technikole" Maxwell aka Metaverse Goddess, Season 1, Episode 2 - NFTs Phygitals Designer Koss Couture.

The Metaverse is the future, interconnected & interoperable.  There are many flavors of metaverse experience out there but none have greater potential than the decentralized metaverse based on the blockchain and Web3.  NFTs are supporting innovative solutions for communities, creators and technologists alike. One of those utilities is the ability to link a digital asset to a real world asset.  Enter Koss Couture, spearheaded by Sonia Kumi.  Sonia is a first rate fashion designer coming out of Ghana. Her collection Koss Couture is comprised of phygitals - NFTs (digital assets) and Fashion Jackets.  Collectors of her fashionable NFT, "Kosspreneur" will receive a real world fashion jacket designed by Sonia Kumi herself!

Check out "Kosspreneur" and acquire your own NFT phygital by a real artist. Show support on Opensea!

https://opensea.io/collection/koss-preneuer

Its time for your Meta Mind Shift, its time to discover the Metaverse, lets go!

MetaMindShift.com

--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/metamindshift/message
